Detailed Description

Wrapper for the SVG storage path.

Note:
This requires ExpatXML for parsing. Include the appropriate expat library (i.e. libexpat.lib, libexpatMT.lib, libexpatML.lib, etc.) Also, if using the static version, be sure to define XML_STATIC.
